content:
Posted: April 9
												Really nice open world arcade racer with the russian touch !!Yes takes place in typical russian city and bourgades, graphics are really nice and spicey, lots of little details here and there.Nice slight blur effect, nice textures and some cool music too.You start the game by just wandering in the city, grabbing any car you can, and then go do races. You earn cash and can buy cars etc.Overall game feels vibrant, colorish and is great in atmoshpere.Other great point : The price.What i would love them to add : achievements and trading cards, if you read devs, thanks.
